item.title: You want WHAT for lunch?
item.dc:creator: Morgan Estes
item.content:encoded:
Last time we were at Cattlemen's, Joanna got her own steak to gum on, but today she has teeth so she's getting steak again for real!

She tried to order lamb fries, but mamma wasn't having any of that nonsense, as you can see in this picture.
